title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 105 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 105 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the LORD; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢耶和华，求告他的名，在万民中传扬他的作为。

lineList.en: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye of all his wondrous works.
lineList.cn: 要向他唱诗歌颂，谈论他一切奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.
lineList.cn: 要以他的圣名夸耀。寻求耶和华的人，心中应当欢喜。

lineList.en: Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.
lineList.cn: 要寻求耶和华与他的能力，时常寻求他的面。

lineList.en: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
lineList.cn: 他仆人亚伯拉罕的后裔，他所拣选雅各的子孙哪，

lineList.en: O ye seed of Abraham his servant, ye children of Jacob his chosen.
lineList.cn: 你们要记念他奇妙的作为和他的奇事，并他口中的判语。

lineList.en: He is the LORD our God: his judgments are in all the earth.
lineList.cn: 他是耶和华我们的神。全地都有他的判断。

lineList.en: He hath remembered his covenant for ever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations.
lineList.cn: 他记念他的约，直到永远，他所吩咐的话，直到千代。

lineList.en: Which covenant he made with Abraham, and his oath unto Isaac;
lineList.cn: 就是与亚伯拉罕所立的约，向以撒所起的誓。

lineList.en: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant:
lineList.cn: 他又将这约向雅各定为律例，向以色列定为永远的约，

lineList.en: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance:
lineList.cn: 说，我必将迦南地赐给你，作你产业的分。

lineList.en: When they were but a few men in number; yea, very few, and strangers in it.
lineList.cn: 当时，他们人丁有限，数目稀少，并且在那地为寄居的。

lineList.en: When they went from one nation to another, from one kingdom to another people;
lineList.cn: 他们从这邦游到那邦，从这国行到那国。

lineList.en: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;
lineList.cn: 他不容什么人欺负他们，为他们的缘故责备君王，

lineList.en: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.
lineList.cn: 说，不可难为我受膏的人，也不可恶待我的先知。

lineList.en: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.
lineList.cn: 他命饥荒降在那地上，将所倚靠的粮食全行断绝。

lineList.en: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:
lineList.cn: 在他们以先打发一个人去。约瑟被卖为奴仆。

lineList.en: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:
lineList.cn: 人用脚镣伤他的脚，他被铁链捆拘。

lineList.en: Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的话试炼他，直等到他所说的应验了。

lineList.en: The king sent and loosed him; even the ruler of the people, and let him go free.
lineList.cn: 王打发人把他解开，就是治理众民的，把他释放。

lineList.en: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:
lineList.cn: 立他作王家之主，掌管他一切所有的。

lineList.en: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.
lineList.cn: 使他随意捆绑他的臣宰，将智慧教导他的长老。

lineList.en: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.
lineList.cn: 以色列也到了埃及，雅各在含地寄居。

lineList.en: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.
lineList.cn: 耶和华使他的百姓生养众多，使他们比敌人强盛。

lineList.en: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.
lineList.cn: 使敌人的心转去恨他的百姓，并用诡计待他的仆人。

lineList.en: He sent Moses his servant; and Aaron whom he had chosen.
lineList.cn: 他打发他的仆人摩西，和他所拣选的亚伦。

lineList.en: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
lineList.cn: 在敌人中间显他的神迹，在含地显他的奇事。

lineList.en: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.
lineList.cn: 他命黑暗，就有黑暗。没有违背他话的。

lineList.en: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.
lineList.cn: 他叫埃及的水变为血，叫他们的鱼死了。

lineList.en: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.
lineList.cn: 在他们的地上，以及王宫的内室，青蛙多多滋生。

lineList.en: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.
lineList.cn: 他说一声，苍蝇就成群而来，并有虱子进入他们四境。

lineList.en: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.
lineList.cn: 他给他们降下冰雹为雨，在他们的地上降下火焰。

lineList.en: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.
lineList.cn: 他也击打他们的葡萄树和无花果树，毁坏他们境内的树木。

lineList.en: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,
lineList.cn: 他说一声，就有蝗虫蚂蚱上来，不计其数，

lineList.en: And did eat up all the herbs in their land, and devoured the fruit of their ground.
lineList.cn: 吃尽了他们地上各样的菜蔬，和田地的出产。

lineList.en: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.
lineList.cn: 他又击杀他们国内一切的长子，就是他们强壮时头生的。

lineList.en: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and there was not one feeble person among their tribes.
lineList.cn: 他领自己的百姓带银子金子出来。他支派中没有一个软弱的。

lineList.en: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.
lineList.cn: 他们出来的时候，埃及人便欢喜。原来埃及人惧怕他们。

lineList.en: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.
lineList.cn: 他铺张云彩当遮盖，夜间使火光照。

lineList.en: The people asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.
lineList.cn: 他们一求，他就使鹌鹑飞来，并用天上的粮食，叫他们饱足。

lineList.en: He opened the rock, and the waters gushed out; they ran in the dry places like a river.
lineList.cn: 他打开磐石，水就涌出。在乾旱之处，水流成河。

lineList.en: For he remembered his holy promise, and Abraham his servant.
lineList.cn: 这都因他记念他的圣言，和他的仆人亚伯拉罕。

lineList.en: And he brought forth his people with joy, and his chosen with gladness:
lineList.cn: 他带领百姓欢乐而出，带领选民欢呼前往。

lineList.en: And gave them the lands of the heathen: and they inherited the labour of the people;
lineList.cn: 他将列国的地赐给他们，他们便承受众民劳碌得来的。

lineList.en: That they might observe his statutes, and keep his laws. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 好使他们遵他的律例，守他的律法。你们要赞美耶和华。
